scripts.install-all: npm run setup && npm install --prefix client && npm install --prefix server
scripts.dev: npx concurrently --names "SERVER,CLIENT" --prefix-colors "cyan.bold,magenta.bold" --prefix "[{name}]" "npm run dev --prefix server" "npx wait-on tcp:3001 && npm run dev --prefix client"
scripts.fix-client: taskkill /F /IM node.exe /T && cd client && rm -r -Force node_modules && npm install
